item.title: SQS - Lambda error hanlding
item.description: Retries Lambda retries donâ€™t have any impact. If an error is thrown, the batch will be sent back to the queue. Then, depending on the visibility timeout configured in the queue, the messages of the batch will be reprocessed.

item.title: Dynamo DB Stream - Lambda error handling
item.description: Event source configuration For DynamoDB (as well as SQS) the default batching window is 0 seconds For Kinesis, DynamoDB, and Amazon SQS event sources: The default batching window ...
